course.subject: ENVR
course.name: The Environment and Society - A Comprehensive Perspective
course.description: This course provides students with a comprehensive understanding of the interaction between society and the environment. The class will examine the social, technological and environmental impacts of human societies past to present. This will include evaluating select environmental issues, such as climate change, from economic, social, scientific, business and health points of view. For students in their first and second year of study or those with approval from instructor for enrolling in the course.

reviews.author: ykl128
reviews.comment_content: This course covers different environmental issue, for example: impact of GM food, water, consumption habit, energy etc. You will know more about the background information of each issue and stimulate you to think more.
reviews.comment_teaching: Good. Professor Lau provides many opportunities for us to discuss and express our opinions towards a controversial issue. He tries to let us learn out of the box, like doing experiments. However, some students may find the lectures boring.
reviews.comment_grading:
Be punctual and more active, you will get a good grade.
Try to attend every class, the professor remember every student's name.
reviews.comment_workload:
To me, not much workload at all. No examinations but got assignments in almost every month.
1) new paper cutting
2) Short essays (focus on self reflection)
3) extra credit work
+
4) a group project (presentation)

reviews.author: CBME girl
reviews.title: 記得曬人名既professor
reviews.comment_content: 講下environment野,有時會講culture.間唔中會有d assignment 同essay比你
reviews.comment_teaching:
個course水分其實幾高，去到上堂其實吸收到既野不太多
有guest lecture, 會搵其他professor嚟講野
不過professor記得曬全班既人名咁濟，所以搵人代take attendance通常會比人捉到（如果唔係水分咁高既堂應該全世界走曬堂）
reviews.comment_grading:
Group project 30%
唔同既essay 每篇10-15%
Environment news report 15%
Extra credits 7% (Optional work)
Attendance 10%

Group project peer evaluation都幾影響個grade大家小心
reviews.comment_workload:
成個course 無final無midterm, 淨係要間唔中寫essay分析下自己既sustainable habits或者環境時事。
每個禮拜都要交兩篇environment news report上lmes. 限定你兩日內既新聞，有時都幾煩
同埋有個group project.  好似係佔30％

reviews.author: Carelesswhisper
reviews.comment_content: 上堂內容十分general，都係關於global environment problems既common sense，但對做assignment/project完全冇用，上堂會做discussion
reviews.comment_teaching: (class size: 100人左右) 個prof.會記住你地啲名..所以唔好諗住搵人代簽啦..同埋上堂傾計會話你
reviews.comment_grading:
個mean極高 (~80%) 踏mean只有C+...
同個prof.第一堂show俾你睇嗰個statistic相差極遠...有extra work會加分
reviews.comment_workload: 3份assignment(都係essay format)+開sem第2個月開始每個禮拜要交2篇newspaper cuttings，而且每堂都take attendance，仲有個要參察既project要做 (6人一組)。不過唔洗midterm/final黎講workload唔算高
